title: [Bug]: DeprecationWarning: fs.Stats constructor is deprecated
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

In version 2.0.17, when starting the program, an error occurs and the program does not start. Version 2.0.16 works fine.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.17

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.Launch from the menu
2.
3.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.Does not start
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

I attach the launch protocol in the terminal

[TeamsLog.txt](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/20771797/TeamsLog.txt)

My system: Linux Mint 22.1 Mate 64-bit
